baseline_texts: The image shows a close-up of a microwave oven placed on a wooden countertop. A hand is partially visible, opening the microwave door. The microwave has a digital control panel with various buttons, and the door has a reflective surface. To the right of the microwave, there appears to be a box or bag labeled "Nipples." The scene is set in a kitchen environment.

This frame shows a close-up image of a microwave oven placed on a wooden countertop. A person's hand is reaching towards the microwave's door, appearing to either open or close it. The microwave has a digital keypad on the right side, with several buttons and a display. There is a napkin box and other items visible in the background on the right side of the microwave. The overall setting seems to be a kitchen or a similar food preparation area.

This image shows a hand opening the door of a stainless steel microwave oven. The microwave is placed on a wooden countertop. To the right of the microwave, there is a package labeled "NADA," which appears to be a food product. The background includes a window sill with a light-colored surface. The scene suggests a kitchen environment.

This frame shows a microwave oven placed on a wooden countertop. A hand is seen touching or about to open the microwave door. The microwave has a digital control panel on the right side with various buttons and a keypad for entering cooking times and settings. In the background to the right, there appears to be a box or carton, possibly food-related, set against the wall. The surface beneath the microwave looks like a kitchen counter or table.

This frame shows a close-up of a kitchen countertop with a microwave oven placed on it. A person's hand is visible, pointing or reaching toward the microwave. To the right of the microwave, there is a bag of Nestl√© Nesquik cereal or powder. The background shows a reflective surface, likely a glass or glossy material, partially reflecting the surroundings including some chairs. The countertop appears to be wooden or a wood-like surface.

This frame shows a close-up of a microwave oven on a countertop. A person's hand is reaching toward or touching the microwave door handle. The microwave has a digital control panel with buttons, including a numeric keypad. Some objects are visible in the background, including a chair and a box of "Napolina" on the right side. The countertop appears wooden, and the microwave has a stainless steel finish.

This frame shows a close-up of a microwave oven with a stainless steel exterior and a black control panel featuring numerous buttons. A person's hand is pointing or reaching toward the microwave door or control panel. The microwave is placed on a wooden countertop. In the background, on the right side of the image, a box of Nabisco Wheat Thins crackers is partially visible. There is also a glimpse of a chair or part of a dining area reflected or seen through a window.

This frame shows a stainless steel microwave oven placed on a wooden countertop. To the right of the microwave, there is a bag of food, possibly a snack or cereal, and a white or light-colored container partially visible. The microwave has a digital keypad with several buttons for different functions and numbers. There is a motion blur indicating that someone's hand is moving quickly in front of the microwave's door.
